Name: Nea Petroupoli
Description: A rapidly growing neighborhood with new residential developments and expanding infrastructure.

Name: Panorama
Description: A hillside neighborhood offering stunning city views and a peaceful environment.

Name: Alsos Petroupolis
Description: A green neighborhood near the famous Petroupoli Grove, known for its parks and walking paths.

Name: Ano Ilioupoli
Description: A residential area with a mix of modern apartments and traditional houses, close to schools and sports facilities.
